title: How do I enable YouTube music controls to stay open always while 4XL is on Pixel Stand?
content: When my Pixel 4XL is on the Pixel Stand, it will only show the Youtube Music information (Artist, art, progress, previous/next track, play/pause) for two MAYBE three songs before my screen shuts off. How do I configure the Phone or Stand to always display this information while on the Stand?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
